---
title: "Quarterly Penang Statistics"
---

**Quarterly Penang Statistics** was published once every three months. Initiated in 1999, this series collates data provided by government departments and private organisations at state and national level, for the use of policymakers, researchers, academics and investors. The statistics found herein are Penang-relevant, and pertain to demographic, social and economic development. Key national economic statistics are also included, covering the areas of agriculture, fisheries, livestock, manufacturing, water, electricity, telecommunications, property, tourism, logistics, health and education.
